text: That Wonderful Urge is a 1948 American romantic comedy movie directed by Robert B. Sinclair and was based on the 1937 remake Love Is News. It stars Gene Tierney, Tyrone Power, Reginald Gardiner, Arleen Whelan, Lucile Watson, Gene Lockhart, Lloyd Gough and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1948 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: That Wonderful Urge
